columns.name: storage_account_name
columns.description: The name of the storage account.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

columns.name: access_tier
columns.description: Access tier for specific share. GpV2 account can choose between TransactionOptimized (default), Hot, and Cool.

columns.name: access_tier_change_time
columns.description: Indicates the last modification time for share access tier.

columns.name: access_tier_status
columns.description: Indicates if there is a pending transition for access tier.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: Returns the date and time the share was last modified.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: Indicates whether the share was deleted.

columns.name: deleted_time
columns.description: The deleted time if the share was deleted.

columns.name: enabled_protocols
columns.description: The authentication protocol that is used for the file share. Can only be specified when creating a share. Possible values include: 'SMB', 'NFS'.

columns.name: remaining_retention_days
columns.description: Remaining retention days for share that was soft deleted.

columns.name: root_squash
columns.description: The property is for NFS share only. The default is NoRootSquash. Possible values include: 'NoRootSquash', 'RootSquash', 'AllSquash'.

columns.name: share_quota
columns.description: The maximum size of the share, in gigabytes. Must be greater than 0, and less than or equal to 5TB (5120). For Large File Shares, the maximum size is 102400.

columns.name: share_usage_bytes
columns.description: The approximate size of the data stored on the share. Note that this value may not include all recently created or recently resized files.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: A name-value pair to associate with the share as metadata.
